name: Oogroots
description:
MasterMagpie

DuncanHiggins

Daniel_Morrison407

KirstenMiller

MatrixSA 

Shani_T8

All humans are gone yet a magical plant called the Oog survives. All it wants to do is spread its roots and reclaim this world. Take control of this magical plant and guide the little Oogroots towards the glowing energy source whilst avoiding all the hazards that come with a post-apocalyptic environment.

Use the WASD keys to guide the Oog towards the goal and the mouse to click the rewind and play buttons.

If you make a mistake then there’s a handy rewind button to go back one step.
